sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"思考，判断，思索"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: think, deliberate, meditate, muse, reason, reflect, speculate
means: think ： 一般用词，指开动脑筋形成看法或得出结论的脑力活动。不着重结论是否正确，见解是否有用。
deliberate ： 指缓慢、按部就班地作仔细而认真的思考或判断。
meditate ： 语气较强，指认真地长时间集中精力进行思考。
muse ： 通常指漫无目的地猜想。
reason ： 指根据资料、证据或事实进行推断，作出结论或判断的逻辑思维活动。
reflect ： 指回想或回顾，侧重认真而冷静地反复地思考某个问题，尤指对已发生事情的思索。
speculate ： 指推论过程，隐含在证据不足的基础上作出推测或设想。

sentence.Network_en: It is premature to speculate about the resumption of negotiations.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在猜测谈判是否会重新开始还为时过早。

sentence.Network_en: People speculate about virtuality systems, but we're already working on it.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们才开始构思虚拟系统的时候，我们已经进行开发了。

sentence.Network_en: It's always hard to speculate about the future.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin speculat- observed from a vantage point, from the verb speculari, from specula 'watchtower', from specere 'to look'

entry.def: If you speculate about something, you make guesses about its nature or identity, or about what might happen.

example.ex: Critics of the project speculate about how many hospitals could be built instead...
example.tran: 对该项目持批评态度的人在推测如果改作他用不知可以建多少所医院。

example.ex: It would be unfair to Debby's family to speculate on the reasons for her suicide...
example.tran: 猜测黛比自杀的原因对她的家人来说是不公平的。

entry.def: If someone speculates financially, they buy property, stocks, or shares, in the hope of being able to sell them again at a higher price and make a profit.

example.ex: Big farmers are moving in, not in order to farm, but in order to speculate with rising land prices...
example.tran: 大农场主正在不断涌进来，不是为了耕作，而是要利用不断上涨的地价进行投机。

example.ex: The banks made too many risky loans which now can't be repaid, and they speculated in property whose value has now dropped.
example.tran: 各银行贷出去太多高风险贷款，目前无法收回，他们还进行地产投机，而地产的价值目前已经下跌了。

means.word_mean: 1. to believe especially on uncertain or tentative grounds;

sentences.sentence: "Scientists supposed that large dinosaurs lived in swamps"

means.word_mean: 2. talk over conjecturally, or review in an idle or casual way and with an element of doubt or without sufficient reason to reach a conclusion;

sentences.sentence: "We were speculating whether the President had to resign after the scandal"
"I mulled over the events of the afternoon"
"philosophers have speculated on the question of God for thousands of years"
"The scientist must stop to observe and start to excogitate"
"I bought this house not because I want to live in it but to sell it later at a good price, so I am speculating"

auth_sentence.content: That is a very difficult one to speculate about.
auth_sentence.res_content: That is a very difficult one to speculate about.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is a very difficult one to speculate about.

auth_sentence.content: In this, we may speculate about hidden causes.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this, we may speculate about hidden causes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this, we may speculate about hidden causes.

auth_sentence.content: The scientists can only speculate as to the cause.
auth_sentence.res_content: The scientists can only speculate as to the cause.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The scientists can only speculate as to the cause.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

Sentence.sentence: She speculated that professors might try even harder to make classes interesting if they were to compete with the devices.
Naomi Pugh at Freed-Hardeman University speculated that professors would have to work harder to enliven their classes

In an interview with the Paris Review Hughes speculated that when a person puts pen to paper, "you meet the terrible resistance of what happened your first year at it, when you couldn't write at all".

means.word_mean: 推断; 猜测, 推测(~ about/on sth)

sentences.en: We don't know all the circumstances, so it would be pointless to speculate.
sentences.cn: 我们不了解所有的情况, 妄加推测是没有意义的。

sentences.en: He speculated that he would succeed.

means.word_mean: 投机; 做投机买卖 (~ in/on sth)

sentences.en: Would he be what he is if he hadn't speculated on the stock of exchange?
sentences.cn: 如果不搞证券投机买卖, 他会成为今天这个样子吗?

jushi.english: We don't know all the circumstances, so it would be pointless to speculate.
jushi.chinese: 我们不了解所有的情况,妄加推测是没有意义的。

jushi.english: The police are speculating that this incident may be linked to a similar attack two weeks ago.
jushi.chinese: 警方推测这次事件可能同两周前的类似的袭击有联系。

jushi.english: He speculated that he would succeed.
